Title: GB-Telford: Children's Services Online Procedures
Description: The Council wish to procure a Provider to host, develop and maintain Telford & Wrekin’s Children’s Services online procedures manual, the Provider will be required to keep up to date with changes in legislation, regulations and statutory guidance, recommend changed to procedures and provide template materials.
Additional Text: The contracting authority considers that this contract may be suitable for economic operators that are small or medium enterprises (SMEs). However, any selection of tenderers will be based solely on the criteria set out for the procurement.

Title: SOC 006 - Shropshire Children's Manual
Description: Shropshire Council are seeking to commission an online procedures manual which sets out the core policy for providing services to children and young people. They reflect relevant legislation, guidance from central government and lessons from research. Staff that are or may be involved in providing services to children and families need to have a working knowledge of these documents and to refer to relevant sections as needed
